featured.text: Still __(35)__ say that aliens were responsible for the growth of highly evolved civilizations which have __(36)__ perished, including the Incan and Mayan civilizations and the legendary Atlantis.

definition.zh_def: 亞特蘭提斯是一個傳說中的失落文明，據說位於大西洋，因為自然災害而沉沒。
definition.en_def: Atlantis is a legendary lost civilization, said to have been located in the Atlantic Ocean and submerged due to a natural disaster.
definition.example: Many stories and theories revolve around the existence of Atlantis.
